pkgmetadata.longdescription: Decomposition of Seats-to-Votes Distortions // Analyses districted electoral systems of any magnitude by computing district-party conversion ratios and seats-to-votes deviations, decomposing the sources of deviation. Traditional indexes are also computed. References: Kedar, O., Harsgor, L. and Sheinerman, R.A. (2016). doi:10.1111/ajps.12225. Penades, A and Pavia, J.M. (2025) ''The decomposition of seats-to-votes distortion in elections: mean, variance, malapportionment and participation''. Acknowledgements: The authors wish to thank Consellera de Educacin, Cultura, Universidades y Empleo, Generalitat Valenciana (grant CIACO/2023/031) for supporting this research.
